title: Homeward bound
creator_contributor_role: Arts and Entertainment Network, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Voyages and travels
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Voyages around the world
description: Episode number 2 of Series "Around the world in 80 days". Homeward bound covers days 28 to 79 of Michael Palin's (ex- Monty Python) 20th Century attempt to replicate the round-the-world trip of the fictional Phineas Fogg. The video takes us with Michael from Madras to Singapore via a Yugoslav freighter on which Palin works as a deckhand; from Singapore to Hong Kong and Shanghai, where Palin samples snake; from Shanghai to California via the eerie uninhabited world of a giant container ship and then by train, dog sled, balloon and ship on the last leg back to London.
related_objects: Series; S00989; Around the world in 80 days; Active; 1989
